meanings.definition: To ruffle excessively or too much.
meanings.sent1: She overruffed her hair before the party, making it look messy.
meanings.sent2: The wind overruffed the leaves on the trees, causing them to rustle loudly.
meanings.sent3: He overruffed the papers on his desk, creating a chaotic mess.
meanings.sent4: The overruffed feathers of the bird made it look bigger than it actually was.
meanings.sent5: The overruffed pillow was so fluffy and comfortable to sleep on.

meanings.definition: To defeat or outdo by ruffing in a card game.
meanings.sent1: She overruffed her opponent in the game, winning with a clever move.
meanings.sent2: He overruffed his friend in the card game, surprising everyone with his skill.
meanings.sent3: The player overruffed his way to victory, leaving his opponents in awe.
meanings.sent4: By overruffing his rival, he secured the win in the intense card match.
meanings.sent5: Her strategic overruffing in the game impressed everyone at the table.
